name: bookstore-mcp
description: BookStore MCP Server with Interactive Widgets for ChatGPT

scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:server
scripts.build:ui: npx @fractal-mcp/cli bundle --entrypoint=./src/ui/BookListWidget.tsx --out=./dist/ui/book-list && npx @fractal-mcp/cli bundle --entrypoint=./src/ui/BookDetailWidget.tsx --out=./dist/ui/book-detail && npx @fractal-mcp/cli bundle --entrypoint=./src/ui/CartWidget.tsx --out=./dist/ui/cart && npx @fractal-mcp/cli bundle --entrypoint=./src/ui/OrderHistoryWidget.tsx --out=./dist/ui/order-history
